alert.message: This is an alert for drop in kafka read rate.
alert.name: Span Transformer- drop in kafka read rate

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "records-consumed.rate" WHERE "subsystem" = 'trends' AND "class" = 'kafka-consumer' AND "application" = 'span-transformer' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

alert.message: This is an alert for drop in kafka send rate.
alert.name: Span Transfomer- drop in kafka records send rate

alert.message:
This alert indicates that Span Transformer is having trouble in writing to kafka.

Probable reasons:
- service is not able to write to kafka because of write's reaching threshold, kafka down or any other reason
alert.name: Span Transformer- increase in kafka records send error rate

alert.message:
This alert is for kafka consumer lag in time for topic proto-spans.

Probable reasons:
- incoming traffic might have increased. Resulting Span Transformer to be behind in reading
- Span Transformer service is too slow in ingesting messaged from proto span kafka topic
alert.name: Span Transformer- increase in kafka consumer lag

targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "ser.success.OneMinuteRate" WHERE "class" = 'metricpoint' AND "application" = 'span-transformer' AND "subsystem" = 'trends' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "value" FROM "ser.success.OneMinuteRate" WHERE "class" = 'metricpoint' AND "application" = 'span-transformer' AND "subsystem" = 'trends' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

alert.message: This is an alert for increase in Span Transformer serialisation failures.
alert.name: Span Transformer- increase in span serde failure

targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "ser.success.OneMinuteRate" WHERE "class" = 'metricpoint' AND "application" = 'span-transformer' AND "subsystem" = 'trends' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

alert.message: This is an alert for increase in Span Transformer deserialisation failure.
alert.name: Span Transformer- increase in metricpoint deserialise failure
